traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Zarak carries a potion of invisibility.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage, plus an extra 5 (2d4 damage) piercing damage if the target is a creature and Zarak has at least 18 hit points.

actions.name: Garrote
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Humanoid. 8 (2d4 + 3 damage) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 8 (2d4 + 3 damage) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns, and Zarak can't grapple another creature or use Assassin's Whim.
